channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Project Lycra playtest (Thursdays at 9PM EST in April)
channel.description:
Have you ever wanted to play a grown-up superhero using the core concepts of PbtA and Masks inspiration? This just might be your jam! ![](/uploads/default/original/2X/e/e40818c5e9c05a9e11b54f964c4cafcc2c971976.jpeg)
Thursday nights in April, I'm going to be running a playtest of my best buddy Jen's newest game design - **Project Lycra**. What's Project Lycra? It's "Grown-Up Masks with Feels". Jen started with the Masks Adult Moves and has created new Team Mechanics as well as a track for confidence vs. trust.
I'll be running the game and Jen will be playing. Be advised, this game is in an early state of development, so things might change between sessions. Trust me though, she'll be making it more awesome each time.
----------------------------------- This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries.
Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. [The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) will be in use as well as questions from the designer after each session.
This game session will be recorded for future publication. The game is scheduled for 3 hours.
[Session 01:](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb1BAaBiIKIJj9j1uFO) [date=2019-04-11 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-04-11 time=23:59:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 02:](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb1BG1f4A70K_LxqUnp) [date=2019-04-18 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-04-18 time=23:59:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 03:](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lb1BHHHkfhjeVedaB2Q) [date=2019-04-25 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-04-25 time=23:59:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"]

item.description:
@Lonnie_Spangler wrote:

I can’t make those dates, but I’m really interested in the system!

Read full topic

item.title: Gauntlet Comics: Project Lycra playtest (Thursdays at 9PM EST in April)

item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

Have you ever wanted to play a grown-up superhero using the core concepts of PbtA and Masks inspiration? This just might be your jam!

Thursday nights in April, I’m going to be running a playtest of my best buddy Jen’s newest game design - Project Lycra. What’s Project Lycra? It’s “Grown-Up Masks with Feels”. Jen started with the Masks Adult Moves and has created new Team Mechanics as well as a track for confidence vs. trust.

I’ll be running the game and Jen will be playing. Be advised, this game is in an early state of development, so things might change between sessions. Trust me though, she’ll be making it more awesome each time.

This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries.

Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy will be in play and safety tools X-Card will be in use as well as questions from the designer after each session.

This game session will be recorded for future publication.
The game is scheduled for 3 hours.

Session 01: Friday, April 12, 2019 1:00 AM → Friday, April 12, 2019 3:59 AM
Session 02: Friday, April 19, 2019 1:00 AM → Friday, April 19, 2019 3:59 AM
Session 03: Friday, April 26, 2019 1:00 AM → Friday, April 26, 2019 3:59 AM
